column5: The tiny house movement is hot. This is your opportunity to experience a very unique tiny house designed and built by a master woodworker. It is complete with queen bed, wifi, TV, fridge, shower, microwave, G fiber and more. It is located on a secluded lot close to city center and the trendy SOCO district. There is an additional Austin Hotel tax which is 9% of the total. This will be paid through once you make the reservation
